Source.Name: cdrdao
Source.Summary: Records audio or data CD-Rs in disk-at-once (DAO) mode
Source.Description: Cdrdao records audio or data CD-Rs in disk-at-once (DAO) mode based on a textual description of the CD contents (toc-file).

Package.Name: cdrdao
Package.Summary: Records audio or data CD-Rs in disk-at-once (DAO) mode
Package.Description: Cdrdao records audio or data CD-Rs in disk-at-once (DAO) mode based on a textual description of the CD contents (toc-file).
